title: Datasets
text: Retention rate (price / MSRP) quantiles used vehicles, computed 3-month age bins vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid price MSRP values included, ages ranging 12 180 months (15 years). Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

title: Datasets
text: Annual vehicle registration counts US state powertrain type, scraped Alternative Fuels Data Center (AFDC) years 2016 2024.
code: head(registrations, 10) #>    year   state                     powertrain   count #> 1  2016 Alabama         Battery Electric (BEV)     500 #> 2  2016 Alabama                      Biodiesel       0 #> 3  2016 Alabama   Compressed Natural Gas (CNG)   20100 #> 4  2016 Alabama                         Diesel  126500 #> 5  2016 Alabama                Flex Fuel (E85)  428300 #> 6  2016 Alabama                      Fuel Cell       0 #> 7  2016 Alabama                       Gasoline 3777300 #> 8  2016 Alabama          Hybrid Electric (HEV)   29100 #> 9  2016 Alabama                       Methanol       0 #> 10 2016 Alabama Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)     900

title: Datasets
text: Cumulative odometer mileage quantiles used vehicles 3-month age bins, computed vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid mileage age 15 years (180 months) included. Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

title: Datasets
text: Daily VMT quantiles used vehicles, computed total odometer miles divided vehicle age days. used vehicles valid mileage age 15 years included. Percentile quantiles 1st 99th provided across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.
code: head(vmt_daily, 10) #>    powertrain vehicle_type quantile     miles #> 1         All          All        1  2.744988 #> 2         All          All        2  4.737732 #> 3         All          All        3  6.107311 #> 4         All          All        4  7.260857 #> 5         All          All        5  8.264062 #> 6         All          All        6  9.157538 #> 7         All          All        7  9.957316 #> 8         All          All        8 10.702454 #> 9         All          All        9 11.360159 #> 10        All          All       10 11.970550

title: Datasets
text: Estimated annual vehicle miles traveled combination powertrain vehicle type. Computed fitting OLS regressions total odometer miles vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; slope coefficient represents estimated annual VMT.
code: head(vmt_annual_type, 10) #>    vehicle_type             powertrain vmt_annual #> 1           Car Battery Electric (BEV)   6311.074 #> 2           CUV Battery Electric (BEV)   9254.098 #> 3           Car               Gasoline   9455.110 #> 4           SUV Battery Electric (BEV)   6173.904 #> 5           CUV               Gasoline  10826.925 #> 6       Minivan               Gasoline  10401.421 #> 7        Pickup               Gasoline  11279.688 #> 8           SUV               Gasoline  10541.941 #> 9           Car                 Diesel  10157.129 #> 10          CUV                 Diesel  10350.614

title: Datasets
text: Estimated annual vehicle miles traveled individual vehicle make/model combinations. Computed fitting OLS regressions total odometer miles vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; slope coefficient represents estimated annual VMT. make/model combinations least 100 listings included, results filtered positive annual VMT values .
code: head(vmt_annual_model, 10) #>          make     model vehicle_type                     powertrain vmt_annual #> 1       Lexus   RX PHEV          CUV Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)   6403.802 #> 2   Chevrolet   Venture      Minivan                       Gasoline  16719.519 #> 3       Honda  Prologue          CUV         Battery Electric (BEV)   3943.976 #> 4        Ford    Escape          CUV Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)   7705.681 #> 5       Lexus TX Hybrid          CUV          Hybrid Electric (HEV)   7951.909 #> 6       Mazda      CX-5          CUV                         Diesel  11223.632 #> 7         Kia       EV9          CUV         Battery Electric (BEV)   7286.152 #> 8  Alfa Romeo    Tonale          CUV Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)   2678.829 #> 9   Chevrolet Blazer EV          CUV         Battery Electric (BEV)   3221.611 #> 10        BMW        i5          Car         Battery Electric (BEV)   4133.829

title: Datasets
text: Market share (proportion) vehicle listings combination two grouping variables, computed across listing years inventory types. Six variable-pair combinations included: powertrain vehicle type, powertrain price bin, vehicle type powertrain, vehicle type price bin, price bin powertrain, price bin vehicle type.
code: head(percent_market, 10) #>    listing_year inventory_type  group_var            group_level category_var #> 1          2023            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 2          2024            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 3          2022            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 4          2018            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 5          2023            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 6          2024            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 7          2023            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 8          2024            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 9          2022            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 10         2021            New powertrain               Gasoline vehicle_type #>    category_level       n           p #> 1             CUV  266235 0.754818351 #> 2             CUV  395155 0.765348911 #> 3             CUV  138423 0.784853261 #> 4         Minivan      31 0.001001421 #> 5             SUV    1340 0.003799112 #> 6             SUV   10860 0.021033997 #> 7          Pickup   19499 0.055282750 #> 8          Pickup   38114 0.073820421 #> 9          Pickup    7686 0.043579334 #> 10            Car 1568596 0.222999993

title: Authors and Citation
text: John Paul Helveston (2022). oica: Data Vehicle Production Sales OICA.
code: @Manual{,   title = {oica: Data on Vehicle Production and Sales from the OICA},   author = {John Paul Helveston},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {https://jhelvy.github.io/oica/}, }

what: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
title: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
text: R data package containing tidy formatted summary data vehicle trends United States. primary data source vehicle listings marketcheck.com, processed summary statistics including depreciation curves, mileage accumulation, market concentration, market share breakdowns. live dashboard data, visit vehicletrends.us.

title: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
text: can install vehicletrends GitHub:
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("vehicletrends/vehicletrends")

title: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
text: loaded, datasets available directly name. See datasets article detailed data dictionaries.
code: library(vehicletrends)

what: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
text: Retention rate (price / MSRP) quantiles used vehicles, computed 3-month age bins vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid price MSRP values included, ages ranging 12 180 months (15 years). Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
code: data(depreciation)

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
text: tibble 6,486 rows 5 variables:

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
text: Computed used vehicle listings data Marketcheck.

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
code: data(depreciation)  head(depreciation) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   age_bin powertrain vehicle_type quantile    rr #>     <dbl> <chr>      <chr>           <dbl> <dbl> #> 1    13.5 All        All                25 0.807 #> 2    13.5 All        All                50 0.943 #> 3    13.5 All        All                75 1.09  #> 4    16.5 All        All                25 0.760 #> 5    16.5 All        All                50 0.901 #> 6    16.5 All        All                75 1.05

what: Market share percentages by variable pairs — percent_market
title: Market share percentages by variable pairs — percent_market
text: Market share (proportion) vehicle listings combination two grouping variables, computed across listing years inventory types. Six variable-pair combinations included: powertrain vehicle type, powertrain price bin, vehicle type powertrain, vehicle type price bin, price bin powertrain, price bin vehicle type.

title: Market share percentages by variable pairs — percent_market
code: data(percent_market)

title: Market share percentages by variable pairs — percent_market
text: tibble 8 variables:

title: Market share percentages by variable pairs — percent_market
text: Computed vehicle listings data Marketcheck.

title: Market share percentages by variable pairs — percent_market
code: data(percent_market)  head(percent_market) #> # A tibble: 6 × 8 #>   listing_year inventory_type group_var  group_level category_var category_level #>          <dbl> <chr>          <chr>      <chr>       <chr>        <chr>          #> 1         2023 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type CUV            #> 2         2024 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type CUV            #> 3         2022 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type CUV            #> 4         2018 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type Minivan        #> 5         2023 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type SUV            #> 6         2024 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type SUV            #> # ℹ 2 more variables: n <int>, p <dbl>

what: Alternative fuel vehicle registrations by state — registrations
title: Alternative fuel vehicle registrations by state — registrations
text: Annual vehicle registration counts US state powertrain type, scraped Alternative Fuels Data Center (AFDC) years 2016 2024.

title: Alternative fuel vehicle registrations by state — registrations
code: data(registrations)

title: Alternative fuel vehicle registrations by state — registrations
text: tibble 5,616 rows 4 variables:

title: Alternative fuel vehicle registrations by state — registrations
text: Scraped Alternative Fuels Data Center (AFDC).

title: Alternative fuel vehicle registrations by state — registrations
code: data(registrations)  head(registrations) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>    year state   powertrain                    count #>   <int> <chr>   <chr>                         <dbl> #> 1  2016 Alabama Battery Electric (BEV)          500 #> 2  2016 Alabama Biodiesel                         0 #> 3  2016 Alabama Compressed Natural Gas (CNG)  20100 #> 4  2016 Alabama Diesel                       126500 #> 5  2016 Alabama Flex Fuel (E85)              428300 #> 6  2016 Alabama Fuel Cell                         0

what: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
title: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
text: Cumulative odometer mileage quantiles used vehicles 3-month age bins, computed vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid mileage age 15 years (180 months) included. Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

title: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
code: data(vmt_age)

title: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
text: tibble 8,118 rows 5 variables:

title: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
text: Computed used vehicle listings data Marketcheck.

title: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
code: data(vmt_age)  head(vmt_age) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   age_bin powertrain vehicle_type quantile   miles #>     <dbl> <chr>      <chr>           <dbl>   <dbl> #> 1     1.5 All        All                25    6.66 #> 2     1.5 All        All                50  106.   #> 3     1.5 All        All                75 1413.   #> 4     4.5 All        All                25   16.5  #> 5     4.5 All        All                50  782.   #> 6     4.5 All        All                75 3222.

what: Estimated annual VMT by make and model — vmt_annual_model
title: Estimated annual VMT by make and model — vmt_annual_model
text: Estimated annual vehicle miles traveled individual vehicle make/model combinations. Computed fitting OLS regressions total odometer miles vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; slope coefficient represents estimated annual VMT. make/model combinations least 100 listings included, results filtered positive annual VMT values .

title: Estimated annual VMT by make and model — vmt_annual_model
code: data(vmt_annual_model)

title: Estimated annual VMT by make and model — vmt_annual_model
text: data frame 548 rows 5 variables:

title: Estimated annual VMT by make and model — vmt_annual_model
text: Computed used vehicle listings data Marketcheck.

title: Estimated annual VMT by make and model — vmt_annual_model
code: data(vmt_annual_model)  head(vmt_annual_model) #>        make     model vehicle_type                     powertrain vmt_annual #> 1     Lexus   RX PHEV          CUV Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)   6403.802 #> 2 Chevrolet   Venture      Minivan                       Gasoline  16719.519 #> 3     Honda  Prologue          CUV         Battery Electric (BEV)   3943.976 #> 4      Ford    Escape          CUV Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)   7705.681 #> 5     Lexus TX Hybrid          CUV          Hybrid Electric (HEV)   7951.909 #> 6     Mazda      CX-5          CUV                         Diesel  11223.632
